elements: Dr Ibn al-Adim, called the Aleppine, has an interest in overlooked history. He has offered you a commission.
Dr Ibn al-Adim, called the Aleppine, has an interest in overlooked history. He could use your assistance.
Mme Olympe Bechet edits the Kerisham Review, which publishes material too ghastly or thrilling for other literary magazines. She has offered you a commission.
